content: Join us at the upcoming HL7 FHIR Connectathon under the 'Integrating eLTSS Among Health and Human Services Providers' track. For more information, go here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2021-09+Integrating+eLTSS+among+Health+and+Human+Services+Providers
We are kicking off our track at the HL7 FHIR Connectathon shortly! Please join us at the 'VIRTUAL TRACK MEET & GREET' here: https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hlsfh_202109/Agenda/1911041

We are moving along with our Integrating eLTSS Among Health and Human Services Providers track sessions. Don't forget to join us for live testing at 1:45pm ET by joining here: https://whova.com/portal/webapp/hlsfh_202109/Agenda/1910344
